text: The Count of Monte Cristo is a 2002 American historical adventure movie. It is based on the 1844 novel of the same name by Alexandre Dumas. It was produced by Roger Birnbaum, Gary Barber, and Jonathan Glickman. It was directed by Kevin Reynolds. It stars Jim Caviezel, Guy Pearce, and Richard Harris. ==References== Category:2002 adventure movies Category:2000s American adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Irish adventure movies Category:Swiss adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Kevin Reynolds
title: The Count of Monte Cristo (2002 movie)
